description: This file defines a React component named Toolbar that provides UI controls for managing a Kanban board, including adding columns, downloading an Excel template, and bulk uploading cards via Excel files. It also manages modal dialogs for user interactions.

methods.name: downloadExcelTemplate
methods.description: Generates and downloads an Excel template with predefined columns for Kanban cards.

methods.name: Toolbar
methods.description: Main React component providing toolbar UI for Kanban board management, including adding columns, downloading templates, and bulk uploading cards.
